name: Add Campaign Monitor subscribers from Google Forms and validating emails with MailboxValidator
description: Every time a new Google Forms response is submitted, Make will automatically validate the email address from the form using MailboxValidator. If the email is verified, it will add a new subscriber in Campaign Monitor. This example uses (this form response sheet)[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1I_0ORbuaKUyehO5qj7l3iWRNYELfAuG5lQzLfyuSw9A/edit#gid=0].
